name: Apps - Install WMI Explorer
description: This will install WMI Explorer, pulls from: https://github.com/vinaypamnani/wmie2/releases

options.name: WMIEFromCloud
options.description: If you check this, we'll reach out and pull the installer directly from the vendor, no need to worry yourself about getting the source files.

options.name: content
options.description: The content for the scripts needed

options.name: WMIEContentItem
options.description: This content item needs to have the WMIExplorer.exe file in the root of it.  If you choose this, it will override the option to install from the cloud.

options.name: scriptName
options.description: the script that does the magic
